DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of ICG liver testing with copeptin and SAPS II score as prognostic markers in critically ill patients.
DOC.brief_title: ICG- Liver Test Versus New Biomarkers as Prognostic Markers in Critically Ill Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison of different marker for length of stay in the ICU in critically ill patients.
DOC.criteria: All patients admitted to the ICU Not able to understand German
